## useCreateAuctionListing() function

> This feature is currently in beta and may change based on feedback that we receive.

Use this to create a new Auction Listing on your marketplace contract.

## Example

```jsx
const Component = () => {
  const {
    mutate: createAuctionListing,
    isLoading,
    error,
  } = useCreateAuctionListing(">>YourMarketplaceContractInstance<<");

  if (error) {
    console.error("failed to create auction listing", error);
  }

  return (
    <button
      disabled={isLoading}
      onClick={() => createAuctionListing(auctionListingData)}
    >
      Create Auction Listing!
    </button>
  );
};
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function useCreateAuctionListing(
  contract: RequiredParam<Marketplace>,
): _tanstack_react_query.UseMutationResult<
  _thirdweb_dev_sdk.TransactionResultWithId<never>,
  unknown,
  NewAuctionListing,
  unknown
>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                             | Description                           |
| --------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| contract  | RequiredParam&lt;Marketplace&gt; | an instance of a Marketplace contract |

**Returns:**

\_tanstack_react_query.UseMutationResult&lt;\_thirdweb_dev_sdk.TransactionResultWithId&lt;never&gt;, unknown, NewAuctionListing, unknown&gt;

a mutation object that can be used to create a new auction listing
